snippet.title: ROT - Purgatory Hill (Release Trailer)
snippet.description:
Psychological Horror Game inspired by Silent Hill.
Avaible Now on Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/rot/364376

Game based on short-film "ROT" by Corridor Digital.
Film originally directed by Adrian Picardi.
Starring Jordan Matlock.
https://www.youtube.com/user/CorridorDigital

#Rot #Indiegames #Gamejolt #PurgatoryHill #CorridorDigital

Socialmedia:
➤Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/RGCrewStudio/
➤Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rgcrew_studio/
➤Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/@RGCrew
➤Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/rgcrew/

➦The game we're currently making: https://store.steampowered.com/app/806760/Departure/
